TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted.... But It contains the essence of the sun its self and you combust as soon as you put it on.

I wish that I was not bored any more.

Granted. You become so bored, you fall asleep and have a dream where you are not bored.

I wish that I could get to work on my school projects with more motivation...

Granted, but you are rendered incapable of actually doing the work, however much you work on it.

I wish a wish of times gone by,

A wish of all things old and new,

The greatest wish that e'er did fly,

Up and away into the endless sky.

Granted. You don't get it because it is of a time that has gone by.

I wish for the computer with the most powerful specs ever.

Granted, but it is so physically dense that it collapses into a black hole.

I wish for the end of all things.

Granted. You find the end of a webpage called "All things" Which is a list of everything in the known universe.

I wish you to lose your moderator powers for a day.

But I'm not a mod, so no effect.

I wish that bees.

Granted. Bees. Your eyes, first. Three large bees congeal from the mass of your eyes and shake themselves free as you scream in pain and shock. As you are still recovering from the initial shock, your hair begins to congeal and eventually separates into a swarm of bees, which remain hovering about your head for a time before moving off, leaving you completely bald and blind. Your teeth then wrench themselves free from your mouth with a shower of honey and pain, and each transmutes itself into a bee. Next comes your internal organs, the bees within being trapped until they trigger the last two parts of the transformation -- your muscle and fat tissues, and your skin. Slowly, your body decomposes, reforming into an immense swarm of bees, causing pain to shoot up your nerves incessantly until every last bit of your body has become a cloud of bees, leaving only your bones, brain, and nervous system. These then coalesce and begin to form a single giant bee, which contains your still living brain.

BEES.

Ã¢â‚¬â€¹I wish people would be more careful with their wishes.

Granted. The wishes are super boring.

I WISH SOMEONE WOULD HAVE TOLD ME ABOUT ALL THESE BEES!

Granted. The bees do the same to you.

I wish that trees!

Granted. The trees destroy all civilization by ending global warming.

I wish I was a pair of boots.

Granted. You are a pair of tooting boots.

Teiw. Narpa. I wish I was Jebediah Kerman's invincible brother, Heoaiririririririririririri!

You cast your spell of Conversion to Jebbeh's Brother. You ARE Kerbin.

I wish I could be Kerbin too.

Granted. However, someone spells kerbin wrong and you are a hivemind of three kerbals. All of them have low courage, high stupidity.

I witos for the1.2

Ehh... What?

I wish for a Tangle Translator.

It wont have any effect.

I wish for Thenewjoemama to become a Treecko.

Granted. However, I am THENEWJOEMAMA, not Thenewjoemama, so I am unaffected.

I with for pie.

Granted. You get kieieieieieiilos pie.

I wish that Tangle Translator actually worked. (I want to be able to call it the TT.)

Granted. The Wishmaking Fairy gives you pi, mistaking the T-T for Pi symbol. Your brain explodes and numbers spill out.

I wish for n = 0, 1, 0, a stable container containing hydrogen compressed @ 1 atmosphere appeared near the ISS. Wait 5 seconds. End.

Granted. The ISS, and the universe, explodes.

I wish for kooky cookies.

Granted, you get cookies made out of Numbuh 3's corpse. You monster.

I wish for THENEWJOEMAMA to become a magikarp.

Granted. He evolves into a Mudkip-Brony crossbreed.

I wish I had obedient zombie slaves.

Granted. They misunderstand what you said, and you get so enraged you tell them to destroy themselves. They obediently do so of course.

I wish I had a giant fighting robot.

Granted. It fights you.

I wish for a fist-sized purple metal nugget.

Granted. It's shaped like a fist and punches your face before becoming inanimate.

I wish the entire forum loved the anime Puella Magi Madoka Magica!
